data.title: Hop We Admire On Working Hard, Overcoming Adversity & Advice For Young Leaders
data.meta_description: As Women's History Month comes to a close, MusiCares highlights four female luminaries who continue to blaze trails in the hip-hop community â€” and inspire other women to do the same.
